website_summaries.verdict: Numerous sizes and designs for all ages of kids. Performs equally well on grass and dirt.
pros: Excellent traction in the outsole of the shoe means you can wear it on dirt or grass and receive the traction you need
Trusted brand name for athletic shoes
Interior of the shoes is cushioned for comfortable practice
cons: This model tends to run narrow and may have limited size availability

customer_reviews.title: Great baseball cleat
customer_reviews.text: We found these shoes originally at Academy's, but they didn't have my son's size. We really wanted them because of the color, and because they came with different colored shoe strings, so we were able to match them with my son's baseball uniform. I found them here, and immediately ordered them. They fit just as they should, and so far they have been great. My son hasn't complained once about his feet hurting or anything else.
customer_reviews.author: J. Kimball

customer_reviews.title: Adidas Performance Wheel House
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time, and not damaged. Size fit perfectly, and they made it through a season without falling apart.
customer_reviews.author: rocketrac07Top Contributor: Baseball

customer_reviews.title: A little big
customer_reviews.text: These are a little bigger in size 11 for my 4 year old then most size 11 shoes, but he's only going to keep growing. They look like they will hold up well enough for him to grow into them, and if they do, I will stick with the 5 star review.
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Super cute too
customer_reviews.text: Ordered these for my 12 year old softball player & she loves them. Super cute too!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Prime customer

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, true to size, and good price
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my 8 year old son who wears a 1M shoe.these are true to size and he told me they are very comfortable and don't make his feet sweat like his football cleats. They do appear breathable and are light weight. Over all a good purchase.
customer_reviews.author: kbrew

customer_reviews.title: Look great - play great
customer_reviews.text: My son loves these cleats because of the "cool camo" on the bottom. He also says they are very comfortable and when I checked where his toes were they seemed like the exact size we needed/ordered. Also, I have to admit when we put the other laces they come with on they look even better matching his uniform. Look great - play great!
customer_reviews.author: Brandon

customer_reviews.title: Durable, comfortable, look great!
customer_reviews.text: Very durable, and comfortable. Got my daughter threw 2 seasons before she out grew them. Love the look.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Herlihy

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes, but run too small
customer_reviews.text: shoes were way smaller than the regular tennis shoes my son wears that are supposedly the same size
customer_reviews.author: BaseballMom

customer_reviews.title: Great look, comfortable fit
customer_reviews.text: These fit as expected for my eight year old grandson. I ordered a tad bigger than his usual size hoping they might last for next year's season as well. They were pliable, comfortable and we're very happy with them.
customer_reviews.author: Alaskan Resident

customer_reviews.title: Great Cleats for Tee Ball
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my boys for Tee Ball. Good quality and my boys say they are comfortable. They must be as they want to wear them all the time!
customer_reviews.author: Raina Fuentes

customer_reviews.title: They fit as expected and my daughter loved that it came with multiple shoelace colors
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves her shoes and wanted to continue wearing them all day, even after her tryouts had ended. They fit as expected and my daughter loved that it came with multiple shoelace colors!
customer_reviews.author: CET

customer_reviews.title: Got this shoes for my son, and he likes ...
customer_reviews.text: Got this shoes for my son, and he likes them a lot! He uses them only for baseball practice and games(2-3 hours/ 4 days a week), and has not complained to be uncomfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: These are awesome cleats! My son loves them
customer_reviews.text: These are awesome cleats! My son loves them! He's a size 4.5 but I ordered a 5 and they were a little big but I was expecting them to be so he could wear them again next year hopefully!
customer_reviews.author: Cathy

customer_reviews.title: A little narrow for grandson who wears an 11. ...
customer_reviews.text: A little narrow for grandson who wears an 11.5 shoe and does not have wide feet. He is okay wearing them for his baseball games though.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda Beck

customer_reviews.title: Does not follow size chart
customer_reviews.text: Size was too big. Used the size chart before I ordered them and they were not accurate.
customer_reviews.author: Cocos Mom

customer_reviews.title: Nice Shoes
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for both of my granddaughters for their first year in softball. They look good and the girls like them. The price is very reasonable. True to size.
customer_reviews.author: Glenda T.

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes
customer_reviews.text: Great shoes for tee ballers. Quality and comfort all rolled into one. My kids love em and it is his first pair of cleats.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Cecchetti

customer_reviews.title: LOve them, great fit.
customer_reviews.text: Good cleats at a decent price. My 6 yr old just started league baseball and these help him "run superfast" in his words. Will buy again when he outgrows these for next year.
customer_reviews.author: Tee Q

customer_reviews.title: Love the style Hate the fit!!!
customer_reviews.text: My grandson said the cleets hurt his foot, they offered no support so we bought inserts but then the shoe was to small to wear....
customer_reviews.author: PAMELA

customer_reviews.title: they are good quality, and I know will make great hand ...
customer_reviews.text: my 4 year old in t-ball loves them! they are good quality, and I know will make great hand me downs for his little brothers!
customer_reviews.author: jamie

customer_reviews.title: Bought these baseball shoes for my little girl. She ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought these baseball shoes for my little girl. She is the one who picked them out. She is 8 years old and she loves them. thank you
customer_reviews.author: 1sgt Loredo

customer_reviews.title: and they are good looking shoes
customer_reviews.text: We couldn't find cleats in his size for T-ball, so we bought these online. They fit as expected, and they are good looking shoes, too. Good purchase.
customer_reviews.author: GCG

customer_reviews.title: like any other shoe
customer_reviews.text: Little tight but have to break in, like any other shoe!
customer_reviews.author: Joelina

customer_reviews.title: But a good quality spike
customer_reviews.text: For most kids spikes I have bought they are typically on the small side not these they are a little big for the size I got. But a good quality spike.
customer_reviews.author: John Sineni

customer_reviews.title: great for t ball
customer_reviews.text: Very impressed. These are actually comfortable. My son says its like walking on air
customer_reviews.author: VAce

customer_reviews.title: Just what we were looking for!
customer_reviews.text: My 9 year old loves them! Excellent quality and fit. I highly recommend them for parents on a budget.
customer_reviews.author: Jada Stark

customer_reviews.title: My son loves them! True to size and can ...
customer_reviews.text: My son loves them! True to size and can handle rough kid outside play!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Smith

customer_reviews.title: They fit well and my kid was comfortable in them
customer_reviews.text: The cleats were as expected. They fit well and my kid was comfortable in them. I would recommend them and order them again.
customer_reviews.author: Jules

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Always great with Adidas!!! Son has long narrower fit and this brand fits him well.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: good quality
customer_reviews.text: We ordered a 4 to match my son's regular shoes and they were way too small. We ended up sending them back and getting a 5. Fit great. Pleased with the price and quality.
customer_reviews.author: merillee Booren

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It was a little bigger than I expected other than that as espected.
customer_reviews.author: Carlos Suarez

customer_reviews.title: True to size very nice. Would prefer black shoe strings instead of white ...
customer_reviews.text: True to size very nice. Would prefer black shoe strings instead of white but that's an easy fix !
customer_reviews.author: Aedmonds

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves these cleats. Says they stay on when she runs and they don't weigh her feet down.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Cleats
customer_reviews.text: My son really liked them. They fit him like a broken in glove.
customer_reviews.author: DAVID BERNAL

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Awesome cleats for the price. First pair that my daughter has outgrown before wearing out.
customer_reviews.author: Keith

customer_reviews.title: My sons loves the look and comfort of the shoe ...
customer_reviews.text: My sons loves the look and comfort of the shoe. He is 9 yo and a true size 4 with his foot measuring 8 3/4.
customer_reviews.author: Tram S.

customer_reviews.title: So far, so good.
customer_reviews.text: Fit my son's feet as they should. He loved them and so far, they are standing up well for a 7 year old's little league season.
customer_reviews.author: J. Malin

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These look great, fit well and perform as they should.
customer_reviews.author: Misty Williams

product_meta.title: adidas Performance Wheel House 2 K Baseball/Softball Shoe (Little Kid/Big Kid)
product_meta.description: With these boys' baseball cleats, he can be quicker than any fielder can touch. Made with a shimmery nubuck upper, they feature EVA cushioning and a bold camo print on the outsole.
feature_bullets: Adidas Wheelhouse 2 K Lo Black/Silver/White Baseball Shoes 10
